text: Not a good experience. The rice was UNCOOKED. When pointed out, the staff insisted it was fine and that it "tastes ok". Subpar food wouldn't recommend.

Son had the mentaiko chicken don bowl. Honestly, it was the best dish we had in cosford. It trumped blue lobster and the seafood stall..

The rice had a nice roasted aroma and the chicken was great

Went there to pack lunch for takeaway. I was early at around 11:45am and staff was having his lunch. I told him to finish first as I can wait but he insisted on preparing my orders 1st. Much appreciated.
We had the grilled chicken, meitaiko chicken and beef rice bowls with 1 set of fried ebi. The rice was delicious with tempura crumbs with mains and a bit of sauce. Serving size is enough for an adult male. The only thing lacking is vegetables.
There's no extra charge for takeaway containers.
The place was rather empty, not sure if we're early or it is regularly like this. There're other food stalls and bar there, foodcourt style. So your party doesn't have to all eat the same food.
I like this rice bowls and will return.

Promotion hidden by the shop and wasn't informed, went back to the only guy in charge, he was rude and argued that he cannot give the promo because we overlook lol.... Food so so only nothing fantastic.
Open on Monday. Came at lunch time, the place is quite empty and plenty of seats. Music was good.
